articles.title: OnePlus 10 Pro pricing leaks ahead of March 31 global launch - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: The OnePlus 10 Pro finally got a global launch date a few days ago, and a new leak has now revealed pricing information for the flagship phone in Europe. It appears, thankfully, that the OnePlus 10 Pro will maintain the pricing of its predecessor.
